thread.title: Your Pickup Truck Takes You for a Ride

author: Holman W. Jenkins, Jr.
title: Your Pickup Truck Takes You for a Ride
text:
Important things are often the least discussed precisely because so many individuals have a stake in not calling attention to them.
When LBJ sought to retaliate against European import restrictions on U.S. frozen chicken, a United Auto Workers chief caught his ear with complaints about a Volkswagen pickup truck (based on the VW microbus) then arriving on U.S. shores. Voilà. Fifty-five years later, the 25% “chicken tax” is why the Big Three have morphed into lucrative pickup-truck companies attached to semi-embarrassing sedan...
